code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./ProductCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product,addToCart}=_ref;const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1);const handleAddToCart=()=>{addToCart(product.id,quantity);setQuantity(1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${product.id}`,className:"product-image-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name,className:"product-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${product.id}`,className:"product-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-category",children:product.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-price",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price",children:["\u20B9",product.price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-selector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:`quantity-${product.id}`,children:"Qty:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{id:`quantity-${product.id}`,value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(parseInt(e.target.value)),children:[1,2,3,4,5].map(num=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:num,children:num},num))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary add-to-cart-btn",onClick:handleAddToCart,children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
